lines.gurmukhi: jYsy iql pIV qyl kwFIAq kstu kY qwN qy hoie dIpk jrwey auijXwro jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Til Peerh Tayl Kaaddheeat Kasatu Kai , Taan Tay Hoi Deepak Jaraaay Ujiyaaro Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as oil is extracted with much effort and when that oil is put in a lamp and lit, spreads light.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy rom rom kir kwtIAY Ajw ko qn qwN kI qwq bwjY rwg rwgnI so ipAwro jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Rom Rom Kari Kaateeai Ajaa Ko Tana , Taan Kee Taat Baajai Raag Raaganee So Piaaro Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a goat's meat is cut into pieces while the strings made of its intestines are used in musical instruments that produce melodies in various Ragas.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau autwie drpn kIjY lost syqI qwN qy kr gih muK dyKq sMswro jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Outaai Darapan Keejai Losat Saytee , Taan Tay Kar Gahi Moukh Daykhat Sansaaro Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a lump of special sand is melted and turned into glass and the whole world holds it in hand to see their face.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy dUK BUK suD swDnw kY swD Bey qw hI qy jgq ko krq insqwro jI ]580]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Dookh Bhookh Sudh Saadhanaa Kai Saadh Bhaay , Taa Hee Tay Jagat Ko Karat Nisataaro Jee ?580?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, one living through all sufferings and tribulations obtains Naam from the True Guru and practices it to discipline one's mind; and with success in penance becomes a person of high virtues. He attaches the worldly people with the True Guru.
